name: TxConnect: Loose Transaction Connector
short_description: TxConnect is implemented using JCA, can be deployed in any J2EE container.It provides support for realtime loosely coupled transactions with legacy systems. A developer will supply a wrapper around the protocol (ssh,telnet,socket,cics,tuxedo,ftp, ...etc)
